id: This is the unique ID for SurrealDB use. This is the main Index in SurrealDB
Properties: This is the Properties object for the Node Object, it is made to simplify the Node Object. It contains properties OTHER than id, Dataset, and DataStatus
Dataset: This is the Dataset Object, the main data container for Node Object
DataStatus: The is the DataStatus object for the Node Object, it contains array of events when the object's status being updated
